    VGUI - The type of a visible GUI.

    IController, Clearable<VGUI>, Closable, IFluentObject<VGUI>, IRequestableContainer, Namable<VGUI>, Named, OptionalNamable<VGUI>, OptionalTokenable<VGUI>, Refreshable, Resettable, Tokenable<VGUI>, Tokened, Typed, TypeRequestable, Configurable, Specifiable, Specified, IElement, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public abstract class VisibleGUI<VGUI extends VisibleGUI<VGUI>>
extends GUI<VGUI>
    A visible GUI is a GUI that is visible on the screen.
